description:
Baroque Works is Crocodile`s undercover criminal organization built up of various agents.
Their purpose is to cause a civil war within Arabasta using manipulation and to collect funds from the bounties of pirates to lead to a takeover of Arabasta and Crocodile`s ultimate goal, obtaining the ancient weapon Pluton.
The main agents in Baroque Works are given code names with male agents being named by number and female agents being named after weekdays or holidays. Lower officers, "Billions" and "Millions" support the higher ranking agents.
name: Baroque Works
